amendment.description: To require manufacturers of dietary supplements to register dietary supplement products with the Food and Drug Administration.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 2127 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 77 - 20. Record Vote Number: 110.

Amendment SA 2127 proposed by Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S3482-3485; text: CR S3482-3483) To require manufacturers of dietary supplements to register dietary supplement products with the Food and Drug Administration.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 2127 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 77 - 20. Record Vote Number: 110.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2127 proposed by Senator Durbin.
